text: I mean definitely if we look it up close there is so much more to see than our eyes can see. And definitely if we touch the things that we can't touch instead of avoiding them we'll feel to our highest. Definitely is important to feel a feeling we can Because that's all we got We are nothing else But our feelings But our sensations At least that is material material at least that is something that we can touch and feel and point to something that we can see out there in the real world and go after at least that is some real meaning real clothes real even home in it I touched close to sky I flown very close to sun The sun. I've flown over the sun into the galaxies that we hear. I've seen them. I've seen them whisper. I've heard. We need to think about this. We have to tell them. We have to go. We need to be fast.
summary: The text is a poetic and introspective passage that explores the importance of human emotions and sensations. The author emphasizes that there is more to life than what we can see, and that by embracing and exploring our feelings, we can gain a deeper understanding of ourselves and the world. They highlight the significance of tangible experiences and sensations, such as touch and sight, as a way to connect with reality. The author also expresses a sense of wonder and awe, describing experiences that transcend the ordinary, such as flying close to the sun and exploring the galaxies. The passage concludes with a sense of urgency, emphasizing the need to share these insights and experiences with others, and to take action quickly. The text is written in a dreamlike, stream-of-consciousness style, conveying a sense of excitement and curiosity about the human experience.

task_analysis.task: Explore and Understand the Importance of Human Feelings and Sensations
requirements: Willingness to explore beyond physical limitations
Ability to reflect on personal feelings and sensations
steps: Acknowledge the limitations of human senses
Explore and experience new sensations and feelings
Reflect on the importance of feelings and sensations in human life
Share insights and understanding with others
Take action to pursue new experiences and knowledge
